text:
I am trying to run the test suite for the newest release (`0.3.1`) for the Gentoo package, but I am getting at least [one error and one fail](https://bpaste.net/show/72848b09f50b).

Could you help me fgure out what went wrong here? The error seems to be related to joblib, which may be intractable, because we use the system joblib (`0.11`) and not the one which nilearn bundles - but what about the fail?
title: Test suite fails
